video.title: Redis Course - In-Memory Database Tutorial
video.description:
Redis is an in-memory data structure store often used as a database. Learn how to use Redis in this crash course for beginners.

Course developed by Daily Code Buffer. Check out their channel: https://www.youtube.com/dailycodebuffer

⭐️ Course Contents ⭐️
⌨️ (00:00) Intro
⌨️ (02:26) Installing Redis
⌨️ (04:01) Redis Strings
⌨️ (11:24) Redis Lists
⌨️ (22:16) Redis Sets
⌨️ (29:46) Redis Sorted Sets
⌨️ (37:01) Redis HyperLogLog
⌨️ (39:43) Redis Hashes
⌨️ (45:23) Redis Transactions
⌨️ (48:47) Redis PubSub
⌨️ (56:25) Redis Scripts
⌨️ (01:05:20) Redis Connection & Security
⌨️ (01:11:09) Redis Geospatial
⌨️ (01:22:11) Redis Benchmark 

⭐️ Special thanks to our Champion supporters! ⭐️ 
🏆 Loc Do
🏆 Joseph C
🏆 DeezMaster

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://freecodecamp.org/news

topLevelComment.author: Daily Code Buffer
topLevelComment.text:
Hey everyone, this is Shabbir (creator of the video here). If you enjoyed this free course, consider subscribing to my Youtube channel for more coding content!

✅ Subscribe To My YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/dailycodebuffer
▶️ Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DailyCodeBuffer

If you have any feedback or comments, you can comment over here or on my channel as well.
Thank you so much and enjoy the course.

As mostly it would be integrated with an application that would perform data insertion and retrieval.

topLevelComment.author: Paras Bhatia
topLevelComment.text:
This is helpful, Have completed till Transactions. 
Feedback as follows (Will keep on adding as I progress)
1. The usage of watch is not adequately explained. I had to refer to the Redis documentation to clear my understanding.
2. Would help if some more negative test cases are demonstrated to cement our understanding.
3. For the Scripts section, a little more detail would help, for example how the country capital example works(word by word)

replies.author: rahul kumar singh
replies.text: use https://laragon.org/  , this contains redis , mysql , and many other tools for development. U can disable service that u don't need in setting of laragon menu.

replies.author: Devon Reid
replies.text: You would need to install WSL first. Then you can easily use redis inside windows.
